text: @piersmorgan @Labour4EU Don't forget that the UK figure was for day 32, which is the combined fig of all (known) deaths so doesn't include the increasingly "lagged " numbers of those lost in care homes and the community, nor does it include those deaths that weren't correctly registered as covid19!
